product.title: Spectrum Matt Black - Venetian Blind
product.description: Dark and matte, the spectrum in matt black is a sturdy, aluminium venetian blind that will add bold, contemporary style wherever it's placed. The metal slats are high quality and hardwearing, resulting in a blind that will last year upon year. An integral part of any monochromatic colour scheme, the matt black is perfectly complemented by light and dark greys, and dazzling whites. Feel free to liven the dcor up with bright limes or hot pinks, creating striking colour schemes in bedrooms, lounges, and kitchens alike.

relproducts.title: Rimini Black - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rimini in black is a classic jet black, rich in both depth and clarity of colour. Yet the fabric is still lightweight enough that it won't block out all of the light from the great outdoors. Ideal for an upstairs bedroom where a good night sleep is a must, the rimini black can serve as a bold new take on a coloured feature wall, or alternatively can be coupled and offset with a range of off-whites and greys to provide a very sleek and modern feel to a bedroom.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Duck Egg Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their stockholm duck egg roller blind is a beautiful light blue, green colour. So subtle in colour it works perfectly with natural and wooden tones throughout the home. The fabric is moisture restitance making it a 'go to' for kitchens and bathrooms. This lovely, blue blind also comes with 5 year guarantee as standard, giving you peace of mind that you blind is built to last. relproducts.title: Genesis Black Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The genesis black roller blind makes the perfect finishing touch to a modern, monochrome scheme. The practical roller design with its sleek lines and black fabric looks smart and stands out against white for an overall effect that is eye-catching yet minimalist. The lightweight dimout fabric creates a stylish window covering that offers privacy when required without dominating your space. Product id: sdb-rbx1786 fabric colour: black material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes genesis black roller blind in black.

relproducts.title: Oslo Blackout Black Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Simple, bold and cohesive, their oslo blackout black roller blind blends minimal style with practical design. A firm favourite, their oslo blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - whether its blackout roller blinds in the bedroom, in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money. At swift direct blind, quality comes first. Their roller blinds are expertly cut and assembled by their roller blinds team, with over 50 years of making blinds and curtains, not only do their blinds come with a quality finish, we provide a free five year guarantee on this product.

relproducts.title: Stirlo Onyx Black
relproducts.description: Stirloonyx black plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

relproducts.title: Rimini (Blackout) Black - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rimini (blackout) in black is simplicity at its best; the combination of the delicately textured blackout fabric with the classic and cool black hue makes this blind functional, stylish, and striking. The rimini black is perfect for any bedroom where the sole aim is the best nights sleep possible. Not one for the faint-hearted, this blind will make a statement in whichever room it's used, giving a particularly sleek yet moody look to any living room or dining room.

relproducts.title: Origin Black - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Don't be put off by the colour black's reputation; the origin in black is much more versatile, and can be far less moody, than you might think. Paired with the right dcor, the gloss aluminium slats and coordinated fittings can look simple and sophisticated. Set the black against white walls in a modern living room and complement with bright limes or fruity oranges for a step away from monochromatic living and towards boldness and colour.

relproducts.title: Prime Noir
relproducts.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 2438mm min drop: 250mm max drop: 2438mm fabric joins: blinds with a width and drop greater than 1730mm may be joined. Order quality budget roller blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery.

relproducts.title: Turin 25mm Jet Black Aluminium Venetian
relproducts.description: Their range of turin 25mm aluminium venetian blinds blend simplicity with functionality, and are perfect for the office - home or away. This jet black venetian blind adds a bold black shade to your home. Match with other grey tones for a modern style, or mix with wooden accessories for a chic finished look. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us which is why not only is this venetian blind made by their team of experts, but it also comes with a free five year guarantee.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Space Blue - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The spectrum range's space blue is a classic, bold blue, on a delightfully smooth, satin-finish aluminium. Fully adjustable slats sit neatly, and can be easily manoeuvred to control the amount of light that is let into the room. Enhance a cool blue child's room by placing the space blue against pale blue walls or patterned wallpaper, pairing with white furniture, and accenting with playful primary colours.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Lima - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Let the natural apple green of the spectrum lima light up your home. The lightweight feel, yet sturdy quality, aluminium slats sit neatly and adjust easily, adding workability and function to style and aesthetics in this pretty blind. The muted green of the lima will match browns and creams in equal measure, and can even sit pretty amongst darker forest greens. Use for a lovely, colourful style in the living room, as a standout window feature in the dining room, or as part of a tranquil, calming scheme in the home office.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Casablanca - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The spectrum casablanca comes with just a hint of fruity orange, making it stand out from other shades of yellow. A shiny, gloss finished blind, it comprises of heavy gauge aluminium slats, alongside coordinating cords and rails. The colour-blocking trend doesn't seem to be going away, so take advantage and use the casablanca against bright sky blues, emerald greens, or stark whites in a den, playroom, or dining room.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Picton Blue - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: If you love blue in all its shades, but are looking for that perfect sky blue, look no further, because we've found it. The spectrum in picton blue is sweet blue that feels as if it's been grabbed directly from the sky, and matching rails and pull-cords streamline the look. The pretty, outdoorsy feel of the picton blue makes this the perfect choice for a light and airy kitchen, where you can recreate a sky-like feel by adding in whites and paler blues.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Solitaire - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The spectrum in solitaire brings a barely-there cream with hints of pink or peach, proving that plain doesn't necessarily mean plain. The satin-finish aluminium is strong and durable, and most importantly, guaranteed not to sag. This wipe-clean blind is perfect for a bathroom or kitchen, and the subtle shade will be beautifully complemented by richer peaches or darker pinks, with silver accents providing the finishing touches.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Magic Mint - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The spectrum in magic mint offers contemporary style and a beautiful spearmint hue that will suit clean, airy rooms. The satin-finish aluminium is durable and lasting, with matching pull-cords and rails resulting in pure, uninterrupted colour. Offset mocha browns and soft taupes by placing the magic mint in the home office amidst light woods and white soft furnishings for a serene, relaxing feel.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Christine - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Add a hint of citrus to a dim window with the spectrum in christine. This fun, vibrant blind has a satin finish and neatly sitting aluminium slats that can be tilted or moved using matching cords according to how much light you would like in the room. Make the christine pop by hanging in a white kitchen or utility room, with colour-coordinated orange and contrasting lime accessories to bring out the gorgeous orange hue.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Pickled Bluewood - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The darkest of blues is blended with a muted, understated elegance, resulting in the pickled bluewood from the spectrum collection. This smooth, satin-finish aluminium blind has horizontal slats that are easily manoeuvrable using the colour-coordinated pull-cords. Keep light disturbances out in the den or home office with the cool pickled bluewood hanging pleasantly in the window, coupled with light greys and chevron patterning.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Gossip - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The spectrum's gossip is a funky lime green with a gloss finish that adds shine and class to the heavy gauge aluminium. The lime shade offers fun and vivacity, making this a bold and colourful choice. The gossip's bright hue will complement stark whites and other citrus shades, the perfect colour scheme for a teenager's bedroom or the home office. Alternatively, use as a complement to a monochromatic dcor scheme, to add a pop of colour in a black and white dining room or bathroom.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Mill Brook - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Creamy and luxurious, yet not overpowering, spectrum's millbrook is a delicious shade of brown. Its discreet satin finish only serves to promote this look, and this blind will look simply gorgeous with the slats adjusted either up or down. Give your home office an opulent feel that is also relaxing and unobtrusive, by placing against cream or pale taupe walls, and accessorising with the occasional splashes of soft aqua and pale gold.
